description:
Don Quixote by Miguel de Cervantes
Language: English
Volume I Published 1605
Volume II Published 1615
Considered the first modern European novel and regarded among the best works of fiction ever written, Don Quixote is a timeless classic that follows the misadventures of an old Spaniard and his faithful side-kick Sancho. 

Spanning two volumes, Cervantes' masterpiece is by no means a quick read, but is engaging and humorous throughout. This app includes both versions of John Ormsby's masterful English translation.

App Features: 
- NEW! POWER SCROLLING quickly move between chapters and the top and bottom of content. -NEW! COPY & PASTE SUPPORT makes note taking easier 
-NEW! FONT PREFERENCE select from different fonts 
-NEW! TEXT-SIZE PREFERENCE choose smaller or larger text sizes 
-NEW! FULL-SCREEN MODE toggle between Full Screen and Normal reading mode 
-AUTO-BOOKMARKING saves your last location 
-THEMES PREFERENCE choose from a number of backgrounds -NOTES take notes alongside your reading and back them up via email 
-EASY TO READ continuous scrolling means less page turning and more content per screen 
-SIDE PANE NAVIGATION quick chapter selections 
-ABOUT THE AUTHOR with a link to Wikipedia
